/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. A blue fence runs along the right side of the street, providing a contrast to the colorful buildings. On the left side of the street, a large tree stands tall, its leaves providing a touch of nature amidst the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
